mapper.select: SELECT teacher_class.evaluation_no , teacher_class.teacher_no, teacher_class.course_no, year, term, teacher_class.class_no, dept.name deptName, user.name teacherName, course.course_name courseName FROM teacher_class, teacher, course, user, dept WHERE class_no = #{classNo} AND year = #{year} AND term = #{term} AND teacher_class.teacher_no = teacher.teacher_no AND teacher_class.teacher_no = user.user_no AND course.course_no = teacher_class.course_no AND dept.dept_no = teacher.dept_no

SELECT evaluation.evaluation_no , evaluation.item_no, category.name category_name, item.name item_name FROM evaluation, item, category WHERE evaluation_no = #{evaluationNo} AND evaluation.item_no = item.item_no AND item.category_no = category.category_no
